main event: A civilian observer reported a bright, flickering object in the sky over Bellingham, Washington on July 30, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a nickel or quarter,It emitted bright bluish-white flickering lights,The sighting lasted between 1 to 3 minutes,The object faded out of sight,The observation was made visually from the ground.
sighted object: a bright, flickering object in the sky
